ARG=`ruby -e "puts (-50..49).to_a.shuffle.join(' ')"`
// to get random numbers
./push_swap $ARG | ./visu/checker -v $ARG
// to run it with the checker

In the checker I still need to:

- Check if the command given are wrongs;

In the algorithm:

- Leave just 3 elements to be sorted;
- Every time store how many numbers i pushed, (recorsive), push back half of them using the middle;
- Push down (RA) the ones above the middle, and then push them back (RRA);
- Go back on stack A and do the same all over again;

Create the cleaner:

- Store the moves in a list;
- Remove the instruction that are one opposite to the other (PA - PB/RRA - RA/SA - SA, but only if there are no R in between)

LIST OF 500 NUMBERS
487 114 6 463 497 50 248 61 321 213 291 454 264 91 249 471 148 210 197 337 306 110 64 319 378 495 34 484 257 79 428 5 145 401 109 310 396 493 419 224 456 451 389 200 311 469 315 193 360 108 474 381 351 430 102 83 465 416 467 338 256 448 473 269 14 464 155 273 28 177 304 254 76 203 375 35 207 302 60 17 274 481 89 53 422 323 142 369 1 438 356 255 202 180 349 143 367 39 92 15 104 288 84 259 489 400 187 191 194 31 427 293 162 299 195 370 362 446 450 387 247 33 267 29 75 392 45 2 199 149 394 461 129 32 342 81 488 322 364 240 457 94 449 206 238 68 87 292 496 252 348 398 190 139 326 354 235 229 4 111 51 490 271 327 222 123 452 433 55 499 281 226 336 318 70 365 366 113 447 443 246 377 175 201 3 230 56 393 296 127 135 276 426 9 26 150 152 343 334 137 42 434 408 144 103 491 353 36 341 297 63 227 236 309 47 20 324 27 100 435 382 359 146 462 479 171 65 82 411 312 62 179 44 406 445 289 57 73 112 283 253 475 386 7 295 98 239 105 282 234 181 96 185 352 455 117 403 344 418 66 244 214 130 277 166 261 301 95 196 77 188 410 58 228 120 161 93 314 258 355 211 285 470 11 101 48 172 12 313 439 483 442 178 480 413 441 167 423 205 209 38 421 67 333 192 189 284 420 472 345 138 8 133 156 74 241 141 339 316 298 308 99 220 347 415 221 215 212 492 300 169 24 163 431 383 115 402 317 90 482 279 251 71 494 121 174 198 332 432 458 186 176 158 134 168 417 409 405 10 160 21 391 328 368 303 43 265 13 397 307 412 97 263 72 22 373 225 216 173 223 346 280 460 363 218 217 390 147 266 425 69 40 477 170 122 243 380 250 357 25 78 372 23 414 294 340 330 119 424 164 331 379 41 183 436 268 16 86 85 204 468 49 245 125 320 290 88 153 500 335 407 485 233 52 476 384 157 80 385 30 19 184 399 140 486 350 429 444 37 118 106 478 358 124 59 287 305 242 237 126 231 437 18 374 136 440 182 54 260 272 128 278 232 131 154 286 107 361 270 208 116 46 159 329 459 498 466 404 376 325 395 151 371 453 275 219 132 262 388 165
